name: chromium
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs chromium from zip.

= REQUIREMENTS:

Debian or Ubuntu.

= ATTRIBUTES:

chromium.user (default deploy) - user's home dir to install to
chromium.location - location to fetch zip from
chromium.expand - location to expand chromium zip to
chromium.symlink - name of symlink to write to /usr/bin
